thread.section_title: Grange Rochester Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel,
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel, - Review of Grange Rochester Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lemon1276
title: Lovely hotel,
text:
This is the second time we've stayed here. Great location, easy walk to Westminster, close to bus and tube.
Small hotel. Staff are excellent, great service. Our room was surprisingly large & looked out onto the green. The windows open which allowed for fresh air, hotels are sometimes overheated.
Good breakfast.
We will certainly be returning.
Room Tip: At the back for a view of the green. See more room tips
